Question
========

Twee gebeurtenissen A en B zijn onafhankelijk als geldt

Answerlist
----------

P (A ∪ B) = P (A) + P (B)
P (A ∪ B) = P (A) + P (B) - P (A ∩ B)
P (A ∩ B) = P (A)   P (B)
P (A | B) = P (B | A)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

P (A ∪ B) = P (A) + P (B): Incorrect
P (A ∪ B) = P (A) + P (B) - P (A ∩ B): Incorrect
P (A ∩ B) = P (A)   P (B): Correct
P (A | B) = P (B | A): Incorrect
